mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginie [verso]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Paris; Note: image depicts back of map. See "Related Item" field for front of map. A very small map appears on page 289 of Description de L'Univers, published in Paris by D. Thierry in 1783. --From This New Founde Lande: The Henry & Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College, 2008.
